verses.verse: It is actually<WG3654> reported<WG191> that there is sexual immorality<WG4202> among<WG1722> you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> such<WG5108> sexual immorality<WG4202> as is<WG3748> not even<WG3761> named<WG3687> among<WG1722> the Gentiles,<WG1484> that<WG5620> one<WG5100> has<WG2192> his<WG3588> father<WG3962>'s wife.<WG1135>
